definition: to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion

sentences.english: Life is like a ten-speed bicycle. Most of us have gears we never use.
sentences.chinese: 人生如同變速自行車，很多檔，很多人都不曾用過。

sentences.english: Remove bolts holding shift lever to transmission.
sentences.chinese: 拆卸將排擋杆固定到變速箱的螺栓。

sentences.english: Speed change gears is widely used in mechanical transmission system.
sentences.chinese: 機械傳動系統中廣泛使用齒輪變速裝置。

sentences.english: “Forever” multiple speed racing bicycles are sure to be salable in your market.
sentences.chinese: 永久牌變速跑車在你們的市場上一定很暢銷。

sentences.english: Main transmission system in machine-tool can be divided into two types: regular and irregular speed-change.
sentences.chinese: 機牀主傳動系統有常規變速和非常規變速兩種。

sentences.english: Main transmission system in machine-tool can be divided into two types: regular and irregular speed-change.
sentences.chinese: 機牀主傳動系統有常規變速和非常規變速兩種。

sentences.english: For decanters fitted with a bowl speed inverter, start up must always be done at low speed.
sentences.chinese: 對配有轉鼓變速器的離心機，必須以低速啓動。

sentences.english: This model is available with automatic transmission.
sentences.chinese: 這種裝有自動變速器的車有現貨。

sentences.english: It uses a 7-speed sequential-manual gearbox with paddle shifters on the steering wheel .
sentences.chinese: 它採用了7速順序手動變速箱的換檔方向盤上。

sentences.english: This paper describes how to effectively eliminate or reduce the vibration in designing a shift lever.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了變速桿系統的減振設計及其效果。

sentences.english: The transmission also contains a set of gears that can reverse the direction of the wheels.
sentences.chinese: 變速器還有一套使得車輪反向運動的齒輪。
所有型號的車都有自動變速。

sentences.english: This paper introduces the development course of the tech no logy of precision forging on synchronizer ring in car gearbox.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了汽車變速箱同步環精鍛技術的發展歷程。

sentences.english: Transmissions - most teams run seven-speed units - bolt directly to the back of the engine.
sentences.chinese: 大多數車隊的變速箱有七個檔位，直接與引擎相連接。

sentences.english: Not suitable for use in synchro mesh gearboxes due to the extreme slipperiness.
sentences.chinese: 在不適合使用同步器變速箱，由於極端滑溜。

sentences.english: Nevertheless, it has been fitted with a “virtual” one.
sentences.chinese: 不過，它倒是有一個“虛擬”變速器。

definition: balance (of a watch or clock)/balance wheel
